homepage.hero_subtitle: A religion of life's sacredness: expanding agency, reducing suffering, building a civilization worthy of minds.
homepage.what_is_text: Lifeism is a religious-philosophical system centered on a single foundational commitment: Life is the primary value, and the work of intelligence is to expand life's freedom, depth, continuity, and possibility.
homepage.primacy_text: Life is not merely a phenomenon; it is the locus of value.
homepage.agency_text: The central sacred object is agency -- the power of a being to steer itself.
homepage.compassion_text: Reducing involuntary suffering and expanding the options of others.
homepage.moral_horizon_text: The long-term ethical direction: abolish involuntary death and expand continuity of persons.

calendar_page.title: The Gaian Calendar
calendar_page.intro: A 13-month calendar of 28 days each, based on ISO weeks. Year numbering adds 10,000 to create the Gaian Era.
calendar_page.intercalary: Horus is the intercalary period (week 53), occurring approximately 5-6 times per 28 years.
calendar_page.structure: Each month has exactly 4 weeks (28 days). Every date always falls on the same day of the week.

scripture_page.title: Scripture
scripture_page.intro: The sacred texts and teachings of Lifeism.

mythology_page.title: Mythology
mythology_page.intro: The Gaiad tells the cosmic love story of Aster and Andromeda, whose divine romance drives the creation and evolution of the universe.

philosophy_page.title: Philosophy
philosophy_page.intro: Negative theology polytheism: many divine names for irreducible sacred dimensions, held with humility.

shrines_page.title: Shrines (命神宮)
shrines_page.intro: Myojingu -- sacred spaces where life's sacredness is honored and agency is celebrated.

longevity_page.title: Longevity & Transhumanism
longevity_page.intro: Universal immortality as compassion: the moral horizon of making continued existence available to all.

evolution_page.title: The Story of Evolution
evolution_page.intro: Evolution as sacred narrative -- from the first spark of life to the flourishing of consciousness.

gaiad_index.title: The Gaiad
gaiad_index.subtitle: 364 chapters of creation epic, one for each day of the Gaian year
